decision_conditions: The proposed relocation of the cycle and waste and recycling storage facilities is a material variation to the consented  scheme and requires separate assessment and a new planning application to be submitted for a variation of condition 1 of planning permission 24/00223/FUL. As such, it is considered that inadequate information has been submitted for Conditions 5 and 7 of planning permission 24/00223/FUL.

Insufficient details have been submitted to demonstrate that the proposal would enhance the nature conservation interest of the site, contrary to  policy G6 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS3 and DM6 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 5 (cycle parking facilities), 7 (waste and recycling facilities), 12 (nature conservation) and 14 (landscape and planting plan) of planning permission 24/00223/FUL (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of 3 storey building with basement and roof accommodation to provide 6no. self-contained flats (3x3-bed/4-person units, 2x2-bed/3-person units and 1x1-bed/2-person unit) with outdoor private amenity space and communal refuse and cycle storage at ground floor.)
